multline:
\begin{multline}
\langle V_N^{(0)}|\{p^I\}\rangle
=\lim_{s\to 0}\,{}_{1\dots N}\langle 0|\exp\left\{
+\frac{1}{2}\,\sum_{I,J=1}^N\,\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}d\kappa\,
a^{-(I)}(\kappa)\,\mu^{IJ}_{N}(\kappa)\,C a^{-(J)}(\kappa)
\right.
\\
+i\sqrt{2\ap}\,\sum_{I=1}^N\,
p^I\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}d\kappa\,
\sqrt{A_s(\kappa)}\,\bigl[\mu^{IJ}(\kappa)+\delta^{IJ}
\bigr]\,C
a^{-(I)}(\kappa)
\\
\left.
-\ap\sum_{I,J=1}^{N} p^I\,p^J\,\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}d\kappa\,A_s(\kappa)
\bigl[\mu^{IJ}(\kappa)+\delta^{IJ}\bigr]
\right\}
\label{VN:1}
\

\begin{multline}
\langle V_N^{(0)}|\{p^I\}\rangle
=(2\pi)^{26}\,\delta(p^{(1)}+\dots+p^{(N)})
\;{}_{1\dots N}\langle \Omega|\exp\left\{
+\ap \sum_{I,J=1}^{N} p^I M^{\prime\,IJ}_{N,\,00}\,p^J
\right.
\\
+i\sqrt{2\ap}\,\sum_{I=1}^N\,
p^I\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}d\kappa\,
\mathscr{P}\,\frac{\sqrt{A_1(\kappa)}}{\kappa}\,
\bigl[\mu^{IJ}(\kappa)-\mu^{IJ}(0)\bigr]\,C
a^{-(I)}(\kappa)
\\
\left.
+\frac{1}{2}\,\sum_{I,J=1}^N\,\int_{-\infty}^{\infty}d\kappa\,
a^{-(I)}(\kappa)\,\mu^{IJ}_{N}(\kappa)\,C a^{-(J)}(\kappa)
\right\},
\label{VN:CF}
\
